content: I am working as a web developer since 2018. Worked in more than 20 live projects and also with more than 10 different clients!

comments.name: Sarah
comments.comment: He is a great developer. His products are brilliant.

comments.name: Jennifer
comments.comment: He is a great web developer. His specialty is pixel-perfect implementation.

comments.name: Kahl Amar
comments.comment: He always does his best. What I see big on him is his strong responsibility.

comments.name: Aynoor
comments.comment: He learns new technologies very fast. I wonder how he could!!!

comments.name: Oliver
comments.comment: I look high his coding style. He keeps at least 80% of Google Coding Style in his projects. But be careful, he sometimes do Ninja-Coding :)
